CustomField.description: Local title (specific to a region) for this position (States and Chapter programs only). NOTE: Historical (prior to October 2015) position title information also migrated here for all programs.
CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Enter a local title for this position, if applicable (States and Chapter programs only).
NOTE: Historical (prior to October 2015) position title information also captured here for all programs.
CustomField.label: Local Title
